Scathing Breath.name: Scathing Breath
Scathing Breath.fullText:
Dragon King Feature Scathing Breath

You channel energy through your implement and into your draconic form, spewing forth a blinding blast of hot ash and grit.

Encounter        Arcane, Fire, Implement
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each creature in the blast

Attack: Primary ability score vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d8 + ability modifier fire damage, and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 99.
Scathing Breath.flavor: You channel energy through your implement and into your draconic form, spewing forth a blinding blast of hot ash and grit.
Scathing Breath.onHit: 4d8 + ability modifier fire damage, and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

Draconic Rampage.name: Draconic Rampage
Draconic Rampage.fullText:
Dragon King Utility 26Draconic Rampage

Your animalistic rage boils over, and you transform into a draconic terror.

Daily        Arcane, Implement, Polymorph
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You assume the form of a rampaging dragon until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, your size increases to Large, and whenever a nonminion creature within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points, you gain 10 temporary hit points. In addition, while in this form, you can use the power Draconic Rampage Attack.


Draconic Rampage Attack

Daily      Arcane, Implement, Polymorph
Immediate Reaction      Melee 1

Requirement: The power Draconic Rampage must be active in order to use this power.

Trigger: An enemy willingly enters a square adjacent to you.

Target: The triggering enemy

Attack: Primary ability score vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d8 + ability modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 99.
Draconic Rampage.flavor: Your animalistic rage boils over, and you transform into a draconic terror.
Draconic Rampage.effect: You assume the form of a rampaging dragon until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, your size increases to Large, and whenever a nonminion creature within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points, you gain 10 temporary hit points. In addition, while in this form, you can use the power Draconic Rampage Attack.
Draconic Rampage.requirement: The power Draconic Rampage must be active in order to use this power.
Draconic Rampage.trigger: An enemy willingly enters a square adjacent to you.
Draconic Rampage.onHit: 2d8 + ability modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
